PROD-001.name: Alpine Technical Parka
PROD-001.description: Weather-resistant parka featuring Canadian goose down insulation and a storm hood with removable fur trim. Built for extreme conditions with reinforced shoulders and articulated elbows.

PROD-002.name: Merino Wool Henley
PROD-002.description: Lightweight henley crafted from ultra-fine New Zealand merino wool. Temperature-regulating properties keep you comfortable in any season with a modern slim fit.

PROD-003.name: Japanese Selvedge Denim
PROD-003.description: Premium raw selvedge denim from Okayama, Japan. Sanforized 14oz fabric with signature red selvage edge. Designed to fade beautifully with wear.

PROD-004.name: Cashmere Cable Knit Sweater
PROD-004.description: Luxurious Scottish cashmere sweater featuring traditional cable knit pattern. Incredibly soft with exceptional warmth-to-weight ratio.

PROD-005.name: Minimalist Leather Sneaker
PROD-005.description: Handcrafted Italian leather sneakers with clean lines and premium construction. Margom sole provides exceptional comfort for all-day wear.

PROD-006.name: Technical Merino Base Layer Set
PROD-006.description: Complete base layer system combining merino wool with technical synthetics. Moisture-wicking and quick-drying for active pursuits.

PROD-007.name: Heritage Leather Briefcase
PROD-007.description: Full-grain vegetable-tanned leather briefcase with brass hardware. Features padded laptop compartment and multiple organizational pockets. Develops beautiful patina over time.

PROD-008.name: Lightweight Down Vest
PROD-008.description: Packable down vest filled with ethically-sourced down. Perfect layering piece that packs into its own pocket for easy travel.

PROD-009.name: Oxford Dress Shirt
PROD-009.description: Classic button-down oxford cloth shirt in premium Egyptian cotton. Timeless design with modern tailoring and mother-of-pearl buttons.

PROD-010.name: Chino Performance Pants
PROD-010.description: Technical chino pants with 4-way stretch and wrinkle-resistant finish. Blends the look of traditional chinos with modern performance fabric.

PROD-011.name: Chelsea Leather Boots
PROD-011.description: Handcrafted Chelsea boots in premium calfskin with Goodyear welt construction. Blake-stitched leather soles provide durability and can be resoled.

PROD-012.name: Merino Wool Blazer
PROD-012.description: Unstructured blazer in premium Italian merino wool. Lightweight and breathable with natural stretch for superior comfort and mobility.

PROD-013.name: Pima Cotton Polo Shirt
PROD-013.description: Luxury polo shirt crafted from Peruvian Pima cotton. Exceptionally soft with a refined drape and resilient construction.

PROD-014.name: Wool-Cashmere Overcoat
PROD-014.description: Double-breasted overcoat in Italian wool-cashmere blend. Classic styling with modern tailoring provides timeless elegance and warmth.

PROD-015.name: Athletic Shorts
PROD-015.description: Versatile athletic shorts with moisture-wicking fabric and 4-way stretch. Perfect for workouts or casual wear with quick-dry technology.

PROD-016.name: Automatic Dive Watch
PROD-016.description: Swiss-made automatic dive watch with 300m water resistance. Features sapphire crystal, unidirectional bezel, and luminous markers.

PROD-017.name: Lightweight Windbreaker
PROD-017.description: Packable windbreaker with DWR finish and breathable mesh lining. Offers wind and light rain protection while remaining highly portable.

PROD-019.description: Refined quarter-zip pullover in extra-fine merino wool. Versatile layering piece with a modern fit and ribbed details.

PROD-020.description: Full-grain leather belt with solid brass buckle. Hand-finished edges and five adjustment holes provide a perfect fit.

PROD-021.name: Cashmere Turtleneck
PROD-021.description: Ultra-soft pure cashmere turtleneck with ribbed collar and cuffs. Classic silhouette perfect for layering or wearing alone.
